title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; install via pip and talk to Ollama in a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM and ChatModel components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-model support, file uploads, and user management.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot (sugarforever/ollama-copilot)
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings and Chroma to chat with local documents.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rs (pepperoni21/ollama-rs)
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-express (jmorganca/ollama-express)
summary: Starter repo showing how to expose Ollama endpoints through an Express.js proxy with CORS and auth.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker (ollama/ollama-docker)
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerised with GPU support.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-nest (vincenzodomina/ollama-nest)
summary: NestJS module that injects an Ollama service with decorators for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET client for Ollama with support for .NET 6+ and async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-discord (daxton/ollama-discord)
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack (gabrielcolson/ollama-slack)
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Bolt JS that integrates Ollama into channels or DMs.

title: ollama-django (kerthin/ollama-django)
summary: Reusable Django app providing admin-configurable Ollama models and a chat widget.

title: ollama-streamlit (trelau/ollama-streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.
